name: Momonga Fighter
description:
Flying Squirrel-themed Rail Shooter!

Developed as an assignment for the Gamedev.tv udemy course.

Game, 3D models, music, and terrible voice acting by Cage Girl T!

Skybox by WorldSkies (downloaded for free off Unity Asset Store)
Trees by SpeedTree IDV (downloaded for free off Unity Asset Store)
Rock textures by epyphany (downloaded for free off Unity Asset Store)
